question: Who suffers from Ablutomania?
solution:
Ablutomania

Ablutomania = Obsessive desire to wash repeatedly.

Hindi Meaning: खुद को साफ करके का पागलपाल

Root Words: abluto = washing + mania = obsession

question: Who suffers from Aboulomania?
solution:
Aboulomania

Aboulomania = Pathological indecision, inability to make decisions.

Hindi Meaning: रोगात्मक अनिर्णयता

Root Words: aboulia = indecision + mania

question: Who suffers from Agromania?
solution:
Agromania

Agromania = Obsession with fields/farming.

Hindi Meaning: खुले स्थानों में रहने की तीव्र इच्छा

Root Words: agro = fields/open spaces + mania

question: Who suffers from Andromania?
solution:
Andromania

Andromania = Obsession or uncontrollable passion for men.

Hindi Meaning: निम्फोमेनिया (पुरुषों के प्रति महिलाओं में अत्यधिक यौन इच्छा)

Root Words: andro = male + mania

question: Who is an Anglomanian?
solution:
Anglomanian

Anglomania = Obsession with English (culture or fashion).

Hindi Meaning: इंग्लैंड और अंग्रेजों के प्रति सनक या जुनून

Root Words: Anglo = English + mania

question: Who suffers from Anthomania?
solution:
Anthomania

Anthomania = Obsessive love or fondness for flowers.

Hindi Meaning: फूलों के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: antho = flowers + mania

question: Who suffers from Aphrodisiomania?
solution:
Aphrodisiomania

Aphrodisiomania = Insatiable sexual desire.

Hindi Meaning: असामान्य यौन रुचि

Root Words: Aphrodite (Greek goddess) + mania

question: Who is Autistic?
option_3: A developmental disorder involving social communication issues
solution:
Autistic

Autistic = Relating to autism spectrum disorder; affects communication and behavior.

Hindi Meaning: संप्रेषण में कठिनाई और सामाजिक कौशल में कमी वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: autos (self)

question: Who suffers from Balletomania?
solution:
Balletomania

Balletomania = Obsession with ballet.

Hindi Meaning: बैले नृत्य के प्रति असामान्य लगाव

Root Words: ballet + mania

question: Who suffers from Bipolar disorder?
option_4: Mood disorder with swings of mania and depression
solution:
Bipolar

Bipolar = Psychiatric condition involving alternating high (mania) and low (depression) moods.

Hindi Meaning: मानसिक स्थिति में अचानक बदलाव वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: bi (two) + polar (poles)

question: Who suffers from Bruxomania?
solution:
Bruxomania

Bruxomania = Involuntary teeth grinding, typically during sleep.

Hindi Meaning: दांत पीसने की आदत

Root Words: brux = grind teeth + mania

question: Who suffers from Cacodemomania?
solution:
Cacodemomania

Cacodemomania = Insane fascination with speaking evil or Satan.

Hindi Meaning: यह रोगात्मक विश्वास कि व्यक्ति में बुरी आत्मा का वास है

Root Words: caco = evil + demon + mania

question: Who suffers from Catapedamania?
solution:
Catapedamania

Catapedamania = Impulse to leap from high places.

Hindi Meaning: ऊँचे स्थानों से कूदने का जुनून

Root Words: catapeda = jumping down + mania

question: Who is Catatonic?
solution:
Catatonic

Catatonic = A state of immobility and stupor, psychiatric condition.

Hindi Meaning: जो प्रतिक्रिया देना बंद कर दे या हिलता न हो

Root Words: kata (down) + tonos (tone/tension)

question: Who suffers from Chinamania?
solution:
Chinamania

Chinamania = Obsession or craze for Chinese things/culture.

Hindi Meaning: चीनी मिट्टी के बर्तन इकट्ठा करने का जुनून

Root Words: China + mania

question: Who suffers from Clinomania?
solution:
Clinomania

Clinomania = Excessive desire to stay in bed.

Hindi Meaning: सोते रहने की अत्यधिक इच्छा

Root Words: clino = bed + mania

question: Who suffers from Copromania?
solution:
Copromania

Copromania = Compulsive desire to defecate or fascination with excrement.

Hindi Meaning: मल के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: copro = feces + mania

question: Who suffers from Cytheromania?
solution:
Cytheromania

Cytheromania = Intense passion for or obsession with love.

Hindi Meaning: यौन सुख के प्रति तीव्र जुनून

Root Words: Cythera (Aphrodite) + mania

question: Who suffers from Dacnomania?
solution:
Dacnomania

Dacnomania = Compulsive urge to bite or nibble.

Hindi Meaning: हत्या का जुनून

Root Words: daknē = bite + mania

question: Who is Delusional?
solution:
Delusional

Delusional = Holding beliefs strongly despite contradictory evidence; a mental illness symptom.

Hindi Meaning: भ्रम में जीने वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: deludere (to deceive)

question: Who suffers from Demonomania?
solution:
Demonomania

Demonomania = Obsession with demons or belief one is possessed.

Hindi Meaning: रोगात्मक विश्वास कि व्यक्ति पर भूत-प्रेतों का साया है

Root Words: demon + mania

question: Who suffers from Dinomania?
solution:
Dinomania

Dinomania = Obsession with dinosaurs.

Hindi Meaning: नृत्य के प्रति पागलपन

Root Words: dino = dinosaur + mania

question: Who suffers from Discomania?
solution:
Discomania

Discomania = Passion or craze for disco.

Hindi Meaning: डिस्को संगीत के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: disco + mania

question: Who suffers from Doramania?
solution:
Doramania

A person who suffers from Doramania has an obsession with owning gifts or presents.

Hindi Meaning: उपहार देने का जुनून

Root Words: dora = gift + mania

question: Who suffered from Drapetomania?
solution:
Drapetomania

Drapetomania = Pathological urge of enslaved people to escape captivity (historical).

Hindi Meaning: घर से भाग जाने की तीव्र इच्छा

Root Words: drapetes = runaway + mania

question: Who suffers from Dromomania?
solution:
Dromomania

Dromomania = Compulsive wandering or traveling.

Hindi Meaning: यात्रा के लिए बाध्यकारी लालसा

Root Words: dromo = running + mania

question: Who suffers from Ecdemomania?
solution:
Ecdemomania

Ecdemomania = Compulsion to be away from home; travel frenzy.

Hindi Meaning: भटकने की असामान्य आदत

Root Words: ecdemo = foreign land + mania

question: Who is an Egomaniac?
solution:
Egomaniac

Egomaniac = Someone with excessive preoccupation with self.

Hindi Meaning: स्वयं को ही सर्वोपरि मानने वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: ego (self) + mania (madness)

question: Who suffers from Eleutheromania?
solution:
Eleutheromania

Eleutheromania = Intense, abnormal desire for freedom.

Hindi Meaning: आज़ादी की उन्मत्त इच्छा

Root Words: eleuthero = freedom + mania

question: Who is affected by Empleomania?
solution:
Empleomania

Empleomania = Compulsive urge to work or find a job.

Hindi Meaning: सार्वजनिक पद पर आसीन होने का उन्माद

Root Words: emplo = job + mania

question: Who suffers from Enosimania?
solution:
Enosimania

Enosimania = Pathological guilt or obsession with fault.

Hindi Meaning: पाप या बुरे कर्म करने के प्रति जुनूनी या रोगात्मक प्रेम

Root Words: enosi = sin + mania

question: Who suffers from Entheomania?
solution:
Entheomania

Entheomania = Pathological belief in one's godlike nature.

Hindi Meaning: असामान्य विश्वास कि व्यक्ति ईश्वरीय प्रेरणा से प्रेरित है

Root Words: entheo = god within + mania

question: Who is an Epomania sufferer?
solution:
Epomania

an obsession with or fondness for epic poetry or the epic form

Hindi Meaning: महाकाव्य कविता या महाकाव्य रूप के प्रति जुनून या लगाव

Root Words: epo = word, song, or epic poetry + mania

question: What does the term Ergasiomania refer to?
solution:
Ergasiomania

Ergasiomania is an abnormal obsession with work. "Ergasio" means work in Greek.

Hindi Meaning: काम करने की अत्यधिक इच्छा; एर्गोमेनिया

Root Words: ergasio = work + mania

question: What does the term Erotomania describe?
option_3: Delusional belief that someone is in love with you
solution:
Erotomania

Erotomania is a delusional disorder where one believes another person, often of higher status, is in love with them.

Hindi Meaning: असामान्य रूप से शक्तिशाली कामवासना

Root Words: eroto = love + mania

question: What is Etheromania the obsession with?
solution:
Etheromania

Etheromania refers to an abnormal craving for ether or inhaling intoxicating vapors.

Hindi Meaning: ईथर की लालसा

Root Words: ether + mania

question: What does Ethnomania refer to?
solution:
Ethnomania

Ethnomania is an obsessive attachment or pride in one’s ethnic or racial identity.

Hindi Meaning: अपने लोगों के प्रति जुनूनी लगाव

Root Words: ethno = race/ethnic + mania

question: What does Eulogomania describe?
solution:
Eulogomania

Eulogomania means an abnormal tendency to praise or flatter excessively.

Hindi Meaning: श्रद्धांजलि देने की अत्यधिक सनक (किसी के अंतिम संस्कार पर भाषण)

Root Words: eulogy + mania

question: A person suffering from Flagellomania is obsessed with?
solution:
Flagellomania

Flagellomania is the abnormal desire to whip or be whipped, often associated with extreme forms of penance or behavior.

Hindi Meaning: कोड़े मारने के प्रति असामान्य उत्साह

Root Words: flagello = whip + mania

question: What does Florimania refer to?
solution:
Florimania

Florimania is a mania or intense obsession for flowers.

Hindi Meaning: फूलों का क्रेज

Root Words: flori = flower + mania

question: Gallomania is an obsession with which of the following?
solution:
Gallomania

Gallomania is an obsession or admiration for French customs or France.

Hindi Meaning: फ़्रांस और फ़्रांसीसियों के प्रति सनक या जुनून

Root Words: Gallo = French + mania

question: If someone has Gamomania, what are they abnormally obsessed with?
solution:
Gamomania

Gamomania refers to an obsession with making marriage proposals.

Hindi Meaning: अजीबोगरीब शादी के प्रस्ताव देने का जुनून

Root Words: gamos = marriage + mania

question: What does Graecomania refer to?
solution:
Graecomania

Graecomania is an intense admiration for Greek culture, history, or arts.

Hindi Meaning: ग्रीस और यूनानियों के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: Graeco = Greek + mania

question: What does Graphomania mean?
solution:
Graphomania

Graphomania is a compulsive urge to write excessively, often without purpose.

Hindi Meaning: लेखन के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: grapho = writing + mania

question: What is Gynaecomania the abnormal obsession with?
solution:
Gynaecomania

Gynaecomania is an abnormal or excessive obsession with women.

Hindi Meaning: महिलाओं के प्रति असामान्य यौन जुनून

Root Words: gynaeco = woman + mania

question: What does Habromania refer to?
solution:
Habromania

Habromania is a mental disorder where a person has delusions of happiness or euphoria.

Hindi Meaning: पागलपन जिसमें खुशनुमा भ्रम शामिल है

Root Words: habros = graceful + mania

question: A person suffering from Hagiomania is obsessed with?
solution:
Hagiomania

Hagiomania is an intense admiration or obsession with saints or holy persons.

Hindi Meaning: संतत्व का उन्माद

Root Words: hagio = saint + mania

question: What does Hexametromania mean?
solution:
Hexametromania

Hexametromania is an abnormal obsession with writing in hexameter verse, a classical poetic meter.

Hindi Meaning: हेक्सामीटर में लिखने का उन्माद

Root Words: hexameter + mania

question: What does Hieromania refer to?
solution:
Hieromania

Hieromania is a mania or obsession with all things sacred or religious.

Hindi Meaning: विकृत धार्मिक दर्शन या भ्रम

Root Words: hiero = sacred + mania

question: If someone has Hippomania, what are they obsessed with?
solution:
Hippomania

Hippomania refers to an obsession with horses.

Hindi Meaning: घोड़ों के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: hippo = horse + mania

question: A person suffering from Hydromania is abnormally obsessed with?
solution:
Hydromania

Hydromania is an extreme craving or obsession with water or being around it.

Hindi Meaning: पानी के लिए अतार्किक लालसा

Root Words: hydro = water + mania

question: What does Hylomania refer to?
solution:
Hylomania

Hylomania is an abnormal love or obsession with forests or wooded areas.

Hindi Meaning: भौतिकवाद की ओर अत्यधिक झुकाव

Root Words: hylo = forest/wood + mania

question: What is Hypermania?
solution:
Hypermania

Hypermania is a state of excessive activity, energy, or agitation, often a severe form of mania.

Hindi Meaning: उन्माद का बढ़ा हुआ स्तर

Root Words: hyper = over + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hypochondriac
solution:
Hypochondriac

A Hypochondriac is someone excessively worried about having a serious illness despite no or mild symptoms.

Hindi Meaning: जिसे हमेशा बीमारी का भ्रम रहता है

Root Words: hypo (under) + chondros (cartilage/ribs)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hypomania
option_2: A person with mild elevation of mood
solution:
Hypomania

A Hypomaniac experiences elevated mood and energy, but not as severe as full-blown mania.

Hindi Meaning: उन्माद का एक हल्का रूप है जो आमतौर पर कम अवधि तक रहता है।

Root Words: hypo = under + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Hysteric
solution:
Hysteric

A Hysteric is someone who exhibits extreme and uncontrollable emotions, often panic or fear.

Hindi Meaning: अत्यधिक उत्तेजित और रोने-चिल्लाने वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: hystera (uterus – old belief of hysteria in women)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Iconomania
solution:
Iconomania

Iconomania comes from "icon" meaning image and "mania" meaning obsession.

Hindi Meaning: प्रतीक या चित्रों के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: icon + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Idolomania
solution:
Idolomania

Idolomania refers specifically to being overly devoted or obsessed with idols.

Hindi Meaning: मूर्तियों के प्रति जुनून या भक्ति

Root Words: idolo = idol + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Infomania
solution:
Infomania

Infomania is the uncontrollable craving for or compulsion to gather facts and information.

Hindi Meaning: तथ्यों को एकत्रित करने के प्रति अत्यधिक समर्पण

Root Words: info + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Insomniac
solution:
Insomniac

Insomniac is derived from Latin “in” (not) + “somnus” (sleep).

Hindi Meaning: जिसे नींद न आने की समस्या हो

Root Words: in (not) + somnus (sleep)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Islomania
solution:
Islomania

Islomania is the intense enthusiasm or love for islands.

Hindi Meaning: द्वीपों के प्रति सनक या जुनून

Root Words: islo = island + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Italomania
solution:
Italomania

Italomania refers to obsession with all things Italian.

Hindi Meaning: इटली या इटालियंस के प्रति जुनून

Root Words: Italo = Italian + mania

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Kleptomaniac
solution:
Kleptomaniac

A Kleptomaniac suffers from kleptomania — a mental condition where one feels compelled to steal.

Hindi Meaning: चोरी की आदत वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: klepto (theft) + mania (madness)

question:
What best describes the meaning of the following word?

Klopemania
solution:
Klopemania

Klopemania means: compulsive urge to steal

Hindi Meaning: चोरी करने की बिमारी

Root Words: klopemania = shoplifting + mania
